nodes.text: Sovi was an individual who served as a personal assistant to Senator Padmé Amidala of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. Following a bioweapon attack on the planet Chandrila in 21 BBY, Amidala tasked Sovi with co-ordinating with the Chandrilan senatorial offices at the Galactic Senate on Coruscant regarding the participation of Amidala's homeworld in the relief effort on Chadrila.
